channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Jacqui heads to Lowestoft in Suffolk to see a one-bed flat that's just a stone's throw from the beach. Dion's in the South Yorkshire town of Mexborough to visit a two-bed terrace in need of a full refurbishment. Tommy visits Whittlesey in Cambridgeshire to cast his eye over a three-bedroom detached house that is seriously lacking in kerb appeal.
